titleInfo.title: [West limits of the City of Hamilton around Paradise Street]

physicalDescription.note: 1 map ; 71 x 60 cm, on sheet 73 x 66 cm. Map lined with archival paper on verso. Large tear running from the lower edge to the middle of the sheet. Upper left corner of sheet lacking.

mods.note: Cartographer uncertain, likely Thomas Allen Blyth. Today, the area is approximately between King Street and Norwood Road, and Longwood Road and Macklin Street. Shows toll gate located along King Street.
